thread.title: Cambridge Analytica CEO bragged about Trump election

title: Cambridge Analytica CEO bragged about Trump election
text:
Cambridge Analytica CEO bragged about Trump election 7:01am EDT - 01:19 
The suspended chief executive of Cambridge Analytica said in a secretly recorded video broadcast on Tuesday that his UK-based political consultancy's online campaign played a decisive role in Donald Trump's 2016 election victory.   
The suspended chief executive of Cambridge Analytica said in a secretly recorded video broadcast on Tuesday that his UK-based political consultancy's online campaign played a decisive role in Donald Trump's 2016 election victory.  //reut.rs/2IGtoqO
